arts.ttl: Middlesbrough fitness update for Hull City as Michael Carrick refuses to use easy excuse
arts.sum: With Carrick now hoping he has at least some fresh reinforcements for Hull City’s visit, he said ahead of Saturday: “I don’t want to dwell too much on the absentees. But asked about it after the game, Boro boss Carrick said: “They were out with illness tonight.

arts.ttl: Michael Carrick's Middlesbrough verdict as he fumes at controversial Blackburn Rovers moment
arts.sum: In the decisive moment that divided the two sides, Hyam was in an offside position as Todd Cantwell played the ball across goal to him to score. A point would have been a point and we would have moved on, but with the way the goal went in, and with us ending up losing the game, it’s pretty hard to take really.

arts.ttl: The inspiration behind Middlesbrough's much-improved goalscoring form - Boro panel
arts.sum: Our panel this week consists of Youtuber and talkSport journalist Phil Spencer, Boro Breakdown co-host Dana Malt, Boropolis co-founder Chris Cassidy and Twe12th Man member John Donovan. Have they spotted a new emphasis in the way Boro play, are certain individuals stepping up or doing something different, or is it as simple as players simply finding their confidence and finally finishing the chances they were always creating?
